body_html:
Should I reopen this when Tensors and Variables are unified?

@apaszke mentioned that after the unification functional functions will automatically work on tensors (in fact normalize already accidentally works on tensors), and then it makes more sense to support it.
body_text:
Should I reopen this when Tensors and Variables are unified?
@apaszke mentioned that after the unification functional functions will automatically work on tensors (in fact normalize already accidentally works on tensors), and then it makes more sense to support it.
body:
Should I reopen this when Tensors and Variables are unified?

@apaszke [mentioned](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3305#issuecomment-339689454) that after the unification `functional` functions will automatically work on tensors (in fact `normalize` already accidentally works on tensors), and then it makes more sense to support it.
